text: Bruno Poromaa (10 May 1936 â€“ 11 September 2016) was a Swedish politician. He was a member of the Riksdag from 1982 to 1994, stepping down to become commissioner of Kiruna Municipality. He retired in 1998. Poromaa died on 11 September 2016 at the age of 80. == References == Category:1936 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Swedish politicians
title: Bruno Poromaa
